name: Manure Ooze
movement: 20 ft. walk, 20 ft. climb, capable of squeezing through 1-foot-wide spaces
description: The Manure Ooze is a repulsive, sluggish mass with a noxious odor, able to move through tight spaces and consume organic material.
memorable: Its ability to split into two smaller oozes upon taking slashing damage complicates engagements with adventurers.
goals: To consume corpses for regeneration and ambush unsuspecting creatures.
relations: Often found in filthy environments; might coexist with other vermin or undead creatures.
environment: Typically found in refuse piles, swamps, or areas with decaying organic matter.
strengths: Immunities to various damage types and conditions, ability to regenerate health, and emission of a debilitating stench.
weaknesses: Sluggish movement and reliance on consuming corpses for health.
attacks: Pseudopod melee attack deals bludgeoning and poison damage.
most_powerful_ability: Digest Corpse allows it to recover health while permanently destroying remains.
senses: Possesses blindsight up to 60 feet, allowing it to detect creatures in darkness.
skills: Has a poor passive Perception score of 8, indicating limited sensory awareness.
additional_information: Can quickly ambush unsuspecting adventurers with its ability to stay active without sleep.
Can create a disadvantage for attackers nearby with its Eye-Watering Stench.
Burning the ooze can make it more dangerous by increasing its fire damage.
Regeneration can lead to longer encounters if not dealt with promptly.
Effectively prevents enemies from reviving their fallen allies by digesting their bodies.
test_queries: sluggish oozing monster with a strong stench
repulsive ooze that consumes corpses for health
ooze that splits into smaller forms when damaged
sticky creature found in decaying organic matter
ooze that emits a debilitating smell in combat
